sentence.Network_en: Atharvaveda means the Veda of the Wise and the Old.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿达婆吠陀意思是明智和古老的吠陀.

sentence.Network_en: Veda is acclaimed as the oldest extant literature available to humans.
sentence.Network_cn: 梨俱吠陀》作为对人类有用的现存最古老文献而被称赞.

sentence.Network_en: A hymn is also dedicated to him alone in Rig Veda.
sentence.Network_cn: 利俱吠陀也有一首独一无二献身于他的诗.

means.word_mean: 1. a collection of mantras and tunes for use with the Rig-Veda

auth_sentence.content: Prime Minister Koffi Sama and his government resign.
auth_sentence.res_content: Prime Minister Koffi Sama and his government resign.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Prime Minister Koffi Sama and his government resign.

auth_sentence.content: The " Veda " surmises that our ethereal body is everlasting.
auth_sentence.res_content: The " Veda " surmises that our ethereal body is everlasting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The " Veda " surmises that our ethereal body is everlasting.

auth_sentence.content: July - President Eyadema reinstates Koffi Sama as prime minister.
auth_sentence.res_content: July - President Eyadema reinstates Koffi Sama as prime minister.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: July - President Eyadema reinstates Koffi Sama as prime minister.
